Hi guys,
 
Is it acceptable to use those white latex gloves when handling a sword
instead of the cotton ones ?
 
Or is this a big no-no ? 
 
The latex ones will not lett any fats or acids through, but does anyone
know if they are treated is such a fashion that it might damage the
blade ?
 
- Matt
